name: Unleash the Archer
description:
Ultimate shooting game where you can unleash your wrath and fury upon your enemies by using a large selection of bows, arrows, and armory. Upgrade your skills, kill bosses, collect some money, and fight again!

FEATURES

• SHOOT — and become a bow master, but don't forget about stamina
• UPGRADE — your equipment and your character, or you WILL DIE
• USE — unique arrows with different effects
• PICK — bonuses to overcome deadly situations
• PROTECT — your village and yourself
• EXPECT — frequent updates with new weapon types, equipment, enemies, and game modes

FUTURE UPDATES

• More arrows with unique effects
• More unique enemies and bosses
• New weapon types with unique gameplay
• Better environment with dynamic background
